feed.title: Saekwang Nam
feed.subtitle: A minimal, portfolio, sidebar, bootstrap Jekyll theme with responsive web design and focuses on text presentation.

entry.title: Text and Typography
entry.summary: This post is to show Markdown syntax rendering on Chirpy, you can also use it as an example of writing. Now, let’s start looking at text and typography. Titles H1 - heading H2 - heading H3 - heading H4 - heading Paragraph I wandered lonely as a cloud That floats on high o’er vales and hills, When all at once I saw a crowd, A host, of golden daffodils; Beside the lake, beneath the t...
